Let me crawl
=======================

Curate proxies from various sources in terms of latency. Supported on python 2.7.* and >3.4.


.. code-block:: bash

    >> from letmecrawl import letmecrawl
    >> for proxy in letmecrawl():
    >>     print(proxy)
    88.99.11.10:6666



Installation
-----------------
.. code-block:: bash

    pip install letmecrawl
